  1. Latest News

  1. Plant Some Shade

    Spring is in the air, and the Plant Some Shade program is back again. Order your trees today! Read on...

  2. Sanitation Bills Due

    Sanitation (garbage and recycling) bills are due February 15. Follow these simple steps to pay online! Read on...

  3. RAGRAI is coming to Council Bluffs!

    Council Bluffs has been selected as an overnight town for RAGBRAI 2019 and is the starting point for the week-long bike ride across Iowa! Read on...

  4. Follow us on Facebook

    Want to stay in-the-know? Make sure you're following all of the City's official Facebook pages. Read on...

  5. Minute with the Mayor

    Mayor Matt Walsh provides weekly video updates on City projects, programs, and services. Find all of the Minute with the Mayor videos on our YouTube channel. Read on...

  6. YouTube Channel

    The City of Council Bluffs is on YouTube! Subscribe today! Read on...

  7. 2018 Year In Review

    With the start of a new year, the City of Council Bluffs is reflecting on the many successes and accomplishments of 2018. Read on...

    Welcome to Council Bluffs, Iowa.

  1. City Spotlights



  1. River's Edge Park Development


    The new community building, River's Edge Pavilion, is available for residents to rent. More details on the redevelopment of the riverfront here.
    Read More

  1. West Broadway Reconstruction Project


    The Multi-million dollar project to transform West Broadway into a more viable and aesthetically pleasing corridor will make a noticeable difference to the front door of Council Bluffs.
    Read More


  1. Police Department Headquarters


    The Council Bluffs Police Department has moved! Their new headquarters building can be found at 1 Ezra Jackson Way. More details here. 
    Read More
